非常不错的一款FPS游戏，虽然才180个小时但已经被深深吸引住了，还记得那些跟朋友五黑坐大牢的时刻，想着想着就笑了

Things I gave to Counter-Strike:
1. Money 
2. Time
3. Love
Things Counter-Strike gave me:
1. Rage
2. Broken keyboard
3. Broken mouse
4. 9/10 ready 
5. Low IQ teammates 
6. Competitive matches 
7. Cheaters
8. 64 tick servers 
9. Anxiety 

Essentially CS is a greedy woman, but I love her all the time.

11/10 would play again
